user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_create_time = #{userCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_is_del = #{userIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_parking_user set community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_create_time = #{userCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_is_del = #{userIsDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id, community_id, user_number, user_name, user_create_time, user_status FROM tb_parking_user u
and user_number like concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%') or user_name like concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%')
and user_create_time between concat(#{begin},' 00:00:00') and concat(#{end},' 23:59:59')
limit #{limit},#{offset}

community_id,
user_number,
user_name ,

mapper.update:

community_id = #{user.communityId},
user_name = #{user.userName},
user_status = #{user.userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{user.userId}
